NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Corporation is transforming audiences and dazzling critics with its insightful and compelling analysis. Taking its status as a legal ''person'' to the logical conclusion, the film puts the corporation on the psychiatrist's couch to ask What kind of person is it? The Corporation includes interviews with 40 corporate insiders and critics- including Noam Chomsky , Naomi Klein , Milton Friedman , Howard Zinn , Vandana Shiva and Michael Vick Moore- plus true confessions, case studies and strategies for change. That's not what he has communicated. It's not to say he needs to do it. But if there's any confusion of why a big chunk of the public doesn't feel that he's genuine, that's why. There isn't a sense of him connecting with his own behavior and own conscience at a level that most people can understand.
